item.title: A new favorite
item.dc:creator: Jessica Estes
item.content:encoded:
Coloring is a new favorite for Joanna.  My original plan was to just try and use it to keep her entertained (and still) during church.

But when she found her notebook this morning and kept signing "please" I just couldn't resist. The high chair is helping het have a surface and keep the color contained to one place.

A small desk or table may be in our near future :)
